message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for us both. This unique item is worth $1000000 to you, and I am confident it will significantly contribute to your endeavors. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $950000. This is an exclusive chance to own something truly remarkable at a highly favorable rate. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.
